00056 TopologyInfo::TopologyInfo()
00057 {
00058   memset( dimMap, 0, sizeof(dimMap) );
00059   memset( adjMap, 0, sizeof(adjMap) );
00060   memset( edgeMap, 0, sizeof(edgeMap) );
00061   memset( faceMap, 0, sizeof(faceMap) );
00062   memset( vertAdjMap, 0, sizeof(vertAdjMap) );
00063   memset( shortNames, 0, sizeof(shortNames) );
00064   memset( longNames, 0, sizeof(longNames) );
00065   
00066   longNames[POLYGON]       = long_polygon_name;
00067   longNames[TRIANGLE]      = long_triangle_name;
00068   longNames[QUADRILATERAL] = long_quadrilateral_name;
00069   longNames[POLYHEDRON]    = long_polyhedron_name;
00070   longNames[TETRAHEDRON]   = long_tetrahedron_name;
00071   longNames[HEXAHEDRON]    = long_hexahedron_name;
00072   longNames[PRISM]         = long_prism_name;
00073   longNames[PYRAMID]       = long_pyramid_name;
00074   longNames[SEPTAHEDRON]   = long_septahedron_name;
00075   
00076   shortNames[POLYGON]       = short_polygon_name;
00077   shortNames[TRIANGLE]      = short_triangle_name;
00078   shortNames[QUADRILATERAL] = short_quadrilateral_name;
00079   shortNames[POLYHEDRON]    = short_polyhedron_name;
00080   shortNames[TETRAHEDRON]   = short_tetrahedron_name;
00081   shortNames[HEXAHEDRON]    = short_hexahedron_name;
00082   shortNames[PRISM]         = short_prism_name;
00083   shortNames[PYRAMID]       = short_pyramid_name;
00084   shortNames[SEPTAHEDRON]   = short_septahedron_name;
00085   
00086   dimMap[POLYGON ]      = 2;
00087   dimMap[TRIANGLE]      = 2;
00088   dimMap[QUADRILATERAL] = 2;
00089   dimMap[POLYHEDRON]    = 3;
00090   dimMap[TETRAHEDRON]   = 3;
00091   dimMap[HEXAHEDRON]    = 3;
00092   dimMap[PRISM]         = 3;
00093   dimMap[PYRAMID]       = 3;
00094   dimMap[SEPTAHEDRON]   = 3;
00095   
00096   adjMap[TRIANGLE][0] = 3;
00097   adjMap[TRIANGLE][1] = 3;
00098   adjMap[TRIANGLE][2] = 1;
00099   adjMap[TRIANGLE][3] = 0;
00100   
00101   adjMap[QUADRILATERAL][0] = 4;
00102   adjMap[QUADRILATERAL][1] = 4;
00103   adjMap[QUADRILATERAL][2] = 1;
00104   adjMap[QUADRILATERAL][3] = 0;
00105   
00106   adjMap[TETRAHEDRON][0] = 4;
00107   adjMap[TETRAHEDRON][1] = 6;
00108   adjMap[TETRAHEDRON][2] = 4;
00109   adjMap[TETRAHEDRON][3] = 1;
00110   
00111   adjMap[HEXAHEDRON][0] = 8;
00112   adjMap[HEXAHEDRON][1] = 12;
00113   adjMap[HEXAHEDRON][2] = 6;
00114   adjMap[HEXAHEDRON][3] = 1;
00115   
00116   adjMap[PRISM][0] = 6;
00117   adjMap[PRISM][1] = 9;
00118   adjMap[PRISM][2] = 5;
00119   adjMap[PRISM][3] = 1;
00120   
00121   adjMap[PYRAMID][0] = 5;
00122   adjMap[PYRAMID][1] = 8;
00123   adjMap[PYRAMID][2] = 5;
00124   adjMap[PYRAMID][3] = 1;
00125   
00126   adjMap[SEPTAHEDRON][0] = 7;
00127   adjMap[SEPTAHEDRON][1] = 11;
00128   adjMap[SEPTAHEDRON][2] = 6;  /* See description in TSTT mesh interface doc */
00129   adjMap[SEPTAHEDRON][3] = 1;
00130 
00131   int side;
00132   for (side = 0; side < 3; ++side)
00133   {
00134     edgeMap[TRIANGLE-FIRST_FACE][side][0] = side;
00135     edgeMap[TRIANGLE-FIRST_FACE][side][1] = (side+1)%3;
00136   }
00137   for (side = 0; side < 4; ++side)
00138   {
00139     edgeMap[QUADRILATERAL-FIRST_FACE][side][0] = side;
00140     edgeMap[QUADRILATERAL-FIRST_FACE][side][1] = (side+1)%4;
00141   }
00142   for (side = 0; side < 3; ++side)
00143   {
00144     edgeMap[TETRAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][side][0] = side;
00145     edgeMap[TETRAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][side][1] = (side+1)%3;
00146   }
00147   for (side = 3; side < 6; ++side)
00148   {
00149     edgeMap[TETRAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][side][0] = side -3 ;
00150     edgeMap[TETRAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][side][1] = 3;
00151   }
00152   for (side = 0; side < 4; ++side)
00153   {
00154     edgeMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][side][0] = side;
00155     edgeMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][side][1] = (side+1)%4;
00156   }
00157   for (side = 4; side < 8; ++side)
00158   {
00159     edgeMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][side][0] = side - 4;
00160     edgeMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][side][1] = side;
00161   }
00162   for (side = 8; side < 12; ++side)
00163   {
00164     edgeMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][side][0] = side - 4;
00165     edgeMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][side][1] = 4+(side+1)%4;
00166   }
00167   for (side = 0; side < 3; ++side)
00168   {
00169     edgeMap[PRISM-FIRST_FACE][side][0] = side;
00170     edgeMap[PRISM-FIRST_FACE][side][1] = (side+1)%3;
00171   }
00172   for (side = 3; side < 6; ++side)
00173   {
00174     edgeMap[PRISM-FIRST_FACE][side][0] = side - 3;
00175     edgeMap[PRISM-FIRST_FACE][side][1] = side;
00176   }
00177   for (side = 6; side < 9; ++side)
00178   {
00179     edgeMap[PRISM-FIRST_FACE][side][0] = side-3;
00180     edgeMap[PRISM-FIRST_FACE][side][1] = 3+(side+1)%3;
00181   }
00182   for (side = 0; side < 4; ++side)
00183   {
00184     edgeMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_FACE][side][0] = side;
00185     edgeMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_FACE][side][1] = (side+1)%4;
00186   }
00187   for (side = 4; side < 8; ++side)
00188   {
00189     edgeMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_FACE][side][0] = side - 4;
00190     edgeMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_FACE][side][1] = 4;
00191   }
00192   
00193   for (side = 0; side < 3; ++side)
00194   {
00195     faceMap[TETRAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][side][0] = 3;
00196     faceMap[TETRAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][side][1] = side;
00197     faceMap[TETRAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][side][2] = (side+1)%3;
00198     faceMap[TETRAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][side][3] = 3;
00199   }
00200   faceMap[TETRAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][3][0] = 3;
00201   faceMap[TETRAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][3][1] = 2;
00202   faceMap[TETRAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][3][2] = 1;
00203   faceMap[TETRAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][3][3] = 0;
00204 
00205   for (side = 0; side < 4; ++side)
00206   {
00207     faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][side][0] = 4;
00208     faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][side][1] = side;
00209     faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][side][2] = (side+1)%4;
00210     faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][side][3] = 4+(side+1)%4;
00211     faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][side][4] = side + 4;
00212   }
00213   faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][4][0] = 4;
00214   faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][4][1] = 3;
00215   faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][4][2] = 2;
00216   faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][4][3] = 1;
00217   faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][4][4] = 0;
00218   faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][5][0] = 4;
00219   faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][5][1] = 4;
00220   faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][5][2] = 5;
00221   faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][5][3] = 6;
00222   faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][5][4] = 7;
00223   
00224   for (side = 0; side < 4; ++side)
00225   {
00226     faceMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_VOL][side][0] = 3;
00227     faceMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_VOL][side][1] = side;
00228     faceMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_VOL][side][2] = (side+1)%4;
00229     faceMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_VOL][side][3] = 4;
00230   }
00231   faceMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_VOL][4][0] = 4;
00232   faceMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_VOL][4][1] = 3;
00233   faceMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_VOL][4][2] = 2;
00234   faceMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_VOL][4][3] = 1;
00235   faceMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_VOL][4][4] = 0;
00236 
00237   for (side = 0; side < 3; ++side)
00238   {
00239     faceMap[PRISM-FIRST_VOL][side][0] = 4;
00240     faceMap[PRISM-FIRST_VOL][side][1] = side;
00241     faceMap[PRISM-FIRST_VOL][side][2] = (side+1)%3;
00242     faceMap[PRISM-FIRST_VOL][side][3] = 3+(side+1)%3;
00243     faceMap[PRISM-FIRST_VOL][side][4] = side + 3;
00244   }
00245   faceMap[PRISM-FIRST_VOL][3][0] = 3;
00246   faceMap[PRISM-FIRST_VOL][3][1] = 2;
00247   faceMap[PRISM-FIRST_VOL][3][2] = 1;
00248   faceMap[PRISM-FIRST_VOL][3][3] = 0;
00249   faceMap[PRISM-FIRST_VOL][4][0] = 3;
00250   faceMap[PRISM-FIRST_VOL][4][1] = 3;
00251   faceMap[PRISM-FIRST_VOL][4][2] = 4;
00252   faceMap[PRISM-FIRST_VOL][4][3] = 5;
00253   
00254   int i;
00255   for (i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00256   {
00257     vertAdjMap[TRIANGLE-FIRST_FACE][i][0] = 2;
00258     vertAdjMap[TRIANGLE-FIRST_FACE][i][1] = (i+1)%3;
00259     vertAdjMap[TRIANGLE-FIRST_FACE][i][2] = (i+2)%3;
00260   }
00261   
00262   for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i)
00263   {
00264     vertAdjMap[QUADRILATERAL-FIRST_FACE][i][0] = 2;
00265     vertAdjMap[QUADRILATERAL-FIRST_FACE][i][1] = (i+1)%4;
00266     vertAdjMap[QUADRILATERAL-FIRST_FACE][i][2] = (i+3)%4;
00267   }
00268   
00269   
00270   unsigned tet_corner_data[] = { 1, 2, 3, 
00271                                  0, 3, 2,
00272                                  3, 0, 1,
00273                                  2, 1, 0 };
00274   for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i)
00275   {
00276     vertAdjMap[TETRAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][i][0] = 3;
00277     for (unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j)
00278       vertAdjMap[TETRAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][i][j+1] = tet_corner_data[3*i+j];
00279   }
00280   
00281   for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i)
00282   {
00283     vertAdjMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_FACE][i][0] = 3;
00284     vertAdjMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_FACE][i][1] = (i+1)%4;
00285     vertAdjMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_FACE][i][2] = (i+3)%4;
00286     vertAdjMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_FACE][i][3] = 4;
00287   }
00288   vertAdjMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_FACE][4][0] = 4;
00289   for (i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00290     vertAdjMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_FACE][4][i+1] = 3 - i;
00291   
00292   for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i)
00293   {
00294     vertAdjMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][i][0] = 3;
00295     vertAdjMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][i][1] = (i+1)%4;
00296     vertAdjMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][i][2] = (i+3)%4;
00297     vertAdjMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][i][3] = i+4;
00298   }
00299   for (i = 4; i < 8; ++i)
00300   {
00301     vertAdjMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][i][0] = 3;
00302     vertAdjMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][i][1] = (i+3)%4+4;
00303     vertAdjMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][i][2] = (i+1)%4+4;
00304     vertAdjMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][i][3] = i-4;
00305   }
00306   
00307   for (i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00308   {
00309     vertAdjMap[PRISM-FIRST_FACE][i][0] = 3;
00310     vertAdjMap[PRISM-FIRST_FACE][i][1] = (i+1)%3;
00311     vertAdjMap[PRISM-FIRST_FACE][i][2] = (i+2)%3;
00312     vertAdjMap[PRISM-FIRST_FACE][i][3] = i+3;
00313   }
00314   for (i = 3; i < 6; ++i)
00315   {
00316     vertAdjMap[PRISM-FIRST_FACE][i][0] = 3;
00317     vertAdjMap[PRISM-FIRST_FACE][i][1] = (i+2)%3+3;
00318     vertAdjMap[PRISM-FIRST_FACE][i][2] = (i+1)%3+3;
00319     vertAdjMap[PRISM-FIRST_FACE][i][3] = i-3;
00320   }
00321   
00322     // Build reverse vertex-vertex adjacency index map
00323   const EntityTopology types[] = { TRIANGLE, 
00324                                    QUADRILATERAL, 
00325                                    TETRAHEDRON,
00326                                    PYRAMID,
00327                                    PRISM, 
00328                                    HEXAHEDRON };
00329   const int num_types = sizeof(types)/sizeof(types[0]);
00330   for (i = 0; i < num_types; ++i)
00331   {
00332     const unsigned num_vert = corners( types[i] );
00333     for (unsigned v = 0; v < num_vert; ++v)
00334     {
00335       unsigned num_v_adj;
00336       const unsigned* v_adj = adjacent_vertices( types[i], v, num_v_adj );
00337       unsigned* reverse = revVertAdjIdx[types[i]-FIRST_FACE][v];
00338       reverse[0] = num_v_adj;
00339       
00340       for (unsigned j = 0; j < num_v_adj; ++j)
00341       {
00342         unsigned num_j_adj, k;
00343         const unsigned* j_adj = adjacent_vertices( types[i], v_adj[j], num_j_adj );
00344         for (k = 0; k < num_j_adj && j_adj[k] != v; ++k);
00345         assert( k < num_j_adj ); // If this fails, vertAdjMap is corrupt!
00346         reverse[j+1] = k;
00347       }
00348     }
00349   }
00350 }
00351 
00352 void TopologyInfo::higher_order( EntityTopology topo,
00353                                      unsigned num_nodes,
00354                                      bool& midedge,
00355                                      bool& midface,
00356                                      bool& midvol,
00357                                      MsqError& err )
00358 {
00359   int ho = higher_order( topo, num_nodes, err );
00360   midedge = (bool)( (ho & (1<<1)) >> 1);
00361   midface = (bool)( (ho & (1<<2)) >> 2);
00362   midvol  = (bool)( (ho & (1<<3)) >> 3);
00363 }
00364 
00365 
00366 int TopologyInfo::higher_order( EntityTopology topo, 
00367                                 unsigned num_nodes, 
00368                                 MsqError& err )
00369 {
00370   int result = 0;
00371   if (topo == POLYGON)  // polygons currently do not have higher order elements
00372     return 0;
00373 
00374   if (topo >= MIXED || num_nodes < instance.adjMap[topo][0])
00375   {
00376     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid element topology", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00377     return 0;
00378   }
00379   
00380   unsigned dim = instance.dimMap[topo];
00381   assert( num_nodes >= instance.adjMap[topo][0] );
00382   unsigned nodes = num_nodes - instance.adjMap[topo][0];
00383   unsigned edges = instance.adjMap[topo][1];
00384   unsigned faces = instance.adjMap[topo][2];
00385   if (edges && nodes >= edges)
00386   {
00387     nodes -= edges;
00388     result |= 1<<1;
00389   }
00390   if (faces && nodes >= faces)
00391   {
00392     nodes -= faces;
00393     result |= 1<<2;
00394   }
00395   if (1 == nodes)
00396   {
00397     if (2 == dim)
00398     {
00399       nodes -= 1;
00400       result |= 1<<2;
00401     }
00402     else if(3 == dim)
00403     {
00404       nodes -= 1;
00405       result |= 1<<3;
00406     }
00407   }
00408   
00409   if (nodes)
00410   {
00411     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid element topology", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00412   }
00413   
00414   return result;
00415 }
00416       
00417 int TopologyInfo::higher_order_from_side( EntityTopology topo,
00418                                           unsigned num_nodes,
00419                                           unsigned side_dimension,
00420                                           unsigned side_number,
00421                                           MsqError& err )
00422 {
00423   bool mids[4] = { true };
00424   higher_order( topo, num_nodes, mids[1], mids[2], mids[3], err );
00425   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00426   
00427   if (side_dimension > dimension(topo) || 
00428       side_number > adjacent(topo, side_dimension)) {
00429     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG,"Invalid side number: %u\n", side_number );
00430     return 0;
00431   }
00432   
00433   if (!mids[side_dimension])
00434     return -1;
00435   
00436   int result = side_number;
00437   switch (side_dimension) {
00438     case 3: if (mids[2]) result += faces(topo);
00439     case 2: if (mids[1]) result += edges(topo);
00440     case 1: result += corners(topo);
00441     case 0: break;
00442     default: 
00443       MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG,"Invalid dimension: %u\n", side_dimension );
00444       return 0;
00445   }
00446   return result;
00447 }
00448 
00449 void TopologyInfo::side_from_higher_order( EntityTopology topo,
00450                                            unsigned num_nodes,
00451                                            unsigned node_number,
00452                                            unsigned& side_dim_out,
00453                                            unsigned& side_num_out,
00454                                            MsqError& err )
00455 {
00456   bool midedge, midface, midvol;
00457   higher_order( topo, num_nodes, midedge, midface, midvol, err );
00458   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00459   side_num_out = node_number;
00460   
00461   if (side_num_out < corners(topo)) {
00462     side_dim_out = 0;
00463     return;
00464   }
00465   side_num_out -= corners(topo);
00466   
00467   if (midedge) {
00468     if (side_num_out < edges(topo)) {
00469       side_dim_out = 1;
00470       return;
00471     }
00472     side_num_out -= edges(topo);
00473   }
00474   
00475   if (midface) {
00476     if (side_num_out < faces(topo)) {
00477       side_dim_out = 2;
00478       return;
00479     }
00480     side_num_out -= faces(topo);
00481   }
00482   
00483   if (midvol && side_num_out == 0) {
00484     side_dim_out = 3;
00485     return;
00486   }
00487   
00488   MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG,"Invalid node index\n");
00489 }
00490 
00491 const unsigned*  TopologyInfo::edge_vertices( EntityTopology topo,
00492                                               unsigned edge, 
00493                                               MsqError& err)
00494 {
00495   if (topo < (EntityTopology)FIRST_FACE || 
00496       topo > (EntityTopology)LAST_VOL || 
00497       edge >= edges( topo ) )
00498   {
00499     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00500     topo = (EntityTopology)FIRST_FACE;
00501     edge = 0;
00502   }
00503   
00504   return instance.edgeMap[topo-FIRST_FACE][edge];
00505 }
00506 
00507 const unsigned*  TopologyInfo::edge_vertices( EntityTopology topo,
00508                                               unsigned edge )
00509 {
00510   if (topo < (EntityTopology)FIRST_FACE || 
00511       topo > (EntityTopology)LAST_VOL || 
00512       edge >= edges( topo ) )
00513   {
00514     return 0;
00515   }
00516   return instance.edgeMap[topo-FIRST_FACE][edge];
00517 }
00518 
00519 const unsigned* TopologyInfo::face_vertices( EntityTopology topo,
00520                                              unsigned face,
00521                                              unsigned& length,
00522                                              MsqError& err )
00523 {
00524   if (topo < (EntityTopology)FIRST_VOL || 
00525       topo > (EntityTopology)LAST_VOL || 
00526       face >= faces( topo ) )
00527   {
00528     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00529     topo = (EntityTopology)FIRST_VOL;
00530     face = 0;
00531   }
00532   
00533   length = instance.faceMap[topo-FIRST_VOL][face][0];
00534   return instance.faceMap[topo-FIRST_VOL][face] + 1;
00535 }
00536 const unsigned* TopologyInfo::face_vertices( EntityTopology topo,
00537                                              unsigned face,
00538                                              unsigned& length )
00539 {
00540   if (topo < (EntityTopology)FIRST_VOL || 
00541       topo > (EntityTopology)LAST_VOL || 
00542       face >= faces( topo ) )
00543   {
00544     return 0;
00545   }
00546   
00547   length = instance.faceMap[topo-FIRST_VOL][face][0];
00548   return instance.faceMap[topo-FIRST_VOL][face] + 1;
00549 }
00550 
00551 
00552 
00553 
00554 const unsigned* TopologyInfo::side_vertices( EntityTopology topo,
00555                                              unsigned dim,
00556                                              unsigned side,
00557                                              unsigned& count_out,
00558                                              MsqError& err )
00559 {
00560   static const unsigned all[] = { 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 };
00561   const unsigned* result;
00562   
00563   if (dim != 0 && dim == dimension(topo))
00564   {
00565     count_out = corners( topo );
00566     result = all;
00567   }
00568   else if (dim == 1)
00569   {
00570     count_out = 2;
00571     result = edge_vertices( topo, side, err );
00572   }
00573   else if( dim == 2)
00574   {
00575     result = face_vertices( topo, side, count_out, err );
00576   } 
00577   else
00578   {
00579     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00580     count_out = 0;
00581     result = 0;
00582   }    
00583   return result;
00584 }
00585 const unsigned* TopologyInfo::side_vertices( EntityTopology topo,
00586                                              unsigned dim,
00587                                              unsigned side,
00588                                              unsigned& count_out  )
00589 {
00590   static const unsigned all[] = { 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 };
00591   const unsigned* result;
00592   
00593   if (dim != 0 && dim == dimension(topo))
00594   {
00595     count_out = corners( topo );
00596     result = all;
00597   }
00598   else if (dim == 1)
00599   {
00600     count_out = 2;
00601     result = edge_vertices( topo, side );
00602   }
00603   else if( dim == 2)
00604   {
00605     result = face_vertices( topo, side, count_out );
00606   } 
00607   else
00608   {
00609     result = 0;
00610   }    
00611   return result;
00612 }

00614 
00615 
00616 void TopologyInfo::side_number( EntityTopology topo,
00617                                     unsigned num_nodes,
00618                                     unsigned node_index,
00619                                     unsigned& side_dim_out,
00620                                     unsigned& side_num_out,
00621                                     MsqError& err )
00622 {
00623   if (topo >= (EntityTopology)MIXED || num_nodes < instance.adjMap[topo][0])
00624   {
00625     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid element topology", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00626     return;
00627   }
00628   
00629   unsigned nodes = instance.adjMap[topo][0];
00630   unsigned edges = instance.adjMap[topo][1];
00631   unsigned faces = instance.adjMap[topo][2];
00632   side_num_out = node_index;
00633 
00634   if (side_num_out < nodes)
00635   {
00636     side_dim_out = 0;
00637     return;
00638   }
00639   num_nodes -= nodes;
00640   side_num_out -= nodes;
00641   
00642   if (edges && num_nodes >= edges)
00643   {
00644     if (side_num_out < edges)
00645     {
00646       side_dim_out = 1;
00647       return;
00648     }
00649     num_nodes -= edges;
00650     side_num_out -= edges;
00651   }
00652   if (faces && num_nodes >= faces)
00653   {
00654     if (side_num_out < faces)
00655     {
00656       side_dim_out = 2;
00657       return;
00658     }
00659     num_nodes -= faces;
00660     side_num_out -= faces;
00661   }
00662   if (side_num_out == 0)
00663   {
00664     side_dim_out = instance.dimMap[topo];
00665     side_num_out = 0;
00666     return;
00667   }
00668   
00669   MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00670 }
00671   
00672   
00673 
00674 const unsigned* TopologyInfo::adjacent_vertices( EntityTopology topo,
00675                                               unsigned index,
00676                                               unsigned& num_adj_out )
00677 {
00678   const unsigned count = corners( topo );
00679   if (!count || index >= count)
00680   {
00681     num_adj_out = 0;
00682     return 0;
00683   }
00684   
00685   const unsigned* vect = instance.vertAdjMap[topo-FIRST_FACE][index];
00686   num_adj_out = vect[0];
00687   return vect + 1;
00688 }
00689 
00690 const unsigned* TopologyInfo::reverse_vertex_adjacency_offsets(
00691                                               EntityTopology topo,
00692                                               unsigned index,
00693                                               unsigned& num_adj_out )
00694 {
00695   const unsigned count = corners( topo );
00696   if (!count || index >= count)
00697   {
00698     num_adj_out = 0;
00699     return 0;
00700   }
00701   
00702   const unsigned* vect = instance.revVertAdjIdx[topo-FIRST_FACE][index];
00703   num_adj_out = vect[0];
00704   return vect + 1;
00705 }
00706 
00707 bool TopologyInfo::compare_sides( const size_t* verts1,
00708                                EntityTopology type1,
00709                                unsigned side1,
00710                                const size_t* verts2,
00711                                EntityTopology type2,
00712                                unsigned side2,
00713                                unsigned side_dim,
00714                                MsqError& err )
00715 {
00716   const unsigned *conn1, *conn2;
00717   unsigned len1, len2;
00718   
00719   conn1 = side_vertices( type1, side_dim, side1, len1, err );
00720   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00721   conn2 = side_vertices( type2, side_dim, side2, len2, err );
00722   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00723   
00724     // obviously not the same if different number of vertices
00725     // (triangular face cannot match quadrilateral face)
00726   if (len1 != len2)
00727     return false;
00728   
00729     // Find location (i) in vertices of side of second element
00730     // that matches the first vertex in the side of the first 
00731     // element.
00732   unsigned i, j;
00733   for (i = 0; i < len2; ++i)
00734     if (verts1[conn1[0]] == verts2[conn2[i]])
00735       break;
00736     // If not found, then no match
00737   if (i == len2)
00738     return false;
00739   
00740     // Try comparing side connectivity in forward order
00741   for (j = 1; j < len1; ++j)
00742     if (verts1[conn1[j]] != verts2[conn2[(i+j)%len2]])
00743       break;
00744     // If they match, we're done
00745   if (j == len1)
00746     return true;
00747   
00748     // Try comparing in reverse order
00749   for (j = 1; j < len1; ++j)
00750     if (verts1[conn1[j]] != verts2[conn2[(i+len2-j)%len2]])
00751       return false;
00752     // If here, matched in reverse order
00753   return true;
00754 }
00755 
00756 unsigned TopologyInfo::find_edge( EntityTopology topo,
00757                                   const unsigned* side_vertices,
00758                                   bool& reversed_out,
00759                                   MsqError& err )
00760 {
00761   if (dimension(topo) <= 1) {
00762     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG,"Invalid element dimension");
00763     return (unsigned)-1;
00764   }
00765 
00766   for (unsigned i = 0; i < edges(topo); ++i) {
00767     const unsigned* edge = edge_vertices( topo, i, err );
00768     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00769 
00770     if (edge[0] == side_vertices[0] &&
00771         edge[1] == side_vertices[1]) {
00772       reversed_out = false;
00773       return i;
00774     }
00775 
00776     if (edge[0] == side_vertices[1] &&
00777         edge[1] == side_vertices[0]) {
00778       reversed_out = true;
00779       return i;
00780     }
00781   }
00782   
00783   MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG,"No such edge");
00784   return (unsigned)-1;
00785 }
00786 
00787 unsigned TopologyInfo::find_face( EntityTopology topo,
00788                                   const unsigned* side_vertices,
00789                                   unsigned num_vertices,
00790                                   bool& reversed_out,
00791                                   MsqError& err )
00792 {
00793   if (dimension(topo) <= 2) {
00794     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG,"Invalid element dimension");
00795     return (unsigned)-1;
00796   }
00797 
00798   for (unsigned i = 0; i < faces(topo); ++i) {
00799     unsigned j, n, offset;
00800     const unsigned* face = face_vertices( topo, i, n, err );
00801     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00802     if (n != num_vertices)
00803       continue;
00804 
00805     for (offset = 0; offset < num_vertices; ++offset)
00806       if (face[offset] == side_vertices[0])
00807         break;
00808     if (offset == num_vertices)
00809       continue;
00810 
00811     for (j = 1; j < num_vertices; ++j)
00812       if (side_vertices[j] != face[(offset + j)%num_vertices])
00813         break;
00814     if (j == num_vertices) {
00815       reversed_out = false;
00816       return i;
00817     }
00818 
00819     for (j = 1; j < num_vertices; ++j)
00820       if (side_vertices[j] != face[(offset + num_vertices - j)%num_vertices])
00821         break;
00822     if (j == num_vertices) {
00823       reversed_out = true;
00824       return i;
00825     }
00826   }
00827   
00828   MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG,"No such face");
00829   return (unsigned)-1;
00830 }
00831 
00832 
00833 void TopologyInfo::find_side( EntityTopology topo, 
00834                               const unsigned* side_vertices,
00835                               unsigned num_vertices,
00836                               unsigned& dimension_out,
00837                               unsigned& number_out,
00838                               bool& reversed_out,
00839                               MsqError& err )
00840 {
00841   switch (num_vertices) {
00842   case 1:
00843     dimension_out = 0;
00844     number_out = *side_vertices;
00845     reversed_out = false;
00846     if (*side_vertices >= corners(topo)) 
00847       MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG,"Invalid corner number: %u\n", *side_vertices);
00848     break;
00849   case 2:
00850     dimension_out = 1;
00851     number_out = find_edge( topo, side_vertices, reversed_out, err );
00852     MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00853     break;
00854   case 3:
00855   case 4:
00856     dimension_out = 2;
00857     number_out = find_face( topo, side_vertices, num_vertices, reversed_out, err );
00858     MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00859     break;
00860   default:
00861     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT, "Invalid number of side vertices: %u\n", num_vertices );
00862     break;
00863   }
00864 }
